original_text: Samuel said to them, ‘This is how the king will rule over you: He will take your sons to be his soldiers. They will ride his horses and they will drive his chariots. They will have to run in front of his own chariot.
korean_text: 이르되 너희를 다스릴 왕의 제도는 이러하니라 그가 너희 아들들을 데려다가 그의 병거와 말을 어거하게 하리니 그들이 그 병거 앞에서 달릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: This is how the king will rule over you
He will take your sons to be his soldiers
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 너희 아들들을 데려가 자기 병사들로 삼을 것이다

sentences.original_text: and they will drive his chariots
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 그의 전차를 몰 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will have to run in front of his own chariot
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신의 전차 앞에서 달려야 할 것이다
